lead_paragraph: Two years after a deadly riot led to promises to fix long-standing problems at a Nebraska prison, officials were struggling Friday to respond to criticism after inmates again seized control of a cellblock in an uprising that left two of them dead.
snippet: Two years after a deadly riot led to promises to fix long-standing problems at a Nebraska prison, officials were struggling Friday to respond to criticism after inmates again seized control of a cellblock in an uprising that left two of them dead....

headline.main: E.U. Lawmakers Call for End to Visa-Free Travel for Americans
headline.print_headline: Europeans Vote to Alter Visa Rules of Americans
